Sentencas: Doped zirconia is a promising electrolyte candidate for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments

Sentencas: The effects of dopants and their interactions with oxygen vacancies on the conduction properties have been systematically investigated by density functional theory (DFT) calculations and experiments.
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments

Sentencas: The influences of dopants' valences and radii on the defect formation energies and defect binding energies are discussed.
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments

Sentencas: Our results show that, for Scandia stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) co-dopedwith In3+, Yb3+, or Bi3+, the defect formation energy differences and binding energy differences of different sites are low, which indicates that for these co-doping cases the oxygen vacancies distribute more randomly, and are more beneficial for improving the oxygen vacancy diffusing efficiency.
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments

Sentencas: The inner influence mechanisms of the co-dopants are discussed from the aspects of elastic and electrostatic effects.
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments

Sentencas: Oxygen diffusion barriers in ScSZ co-doped with various elements are also calculated by the saddle point method.
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments

Sentencas: The calculated results indicate that the diffusion barrier orders for different edges are ESc-Zr < EZr-Zr < ESc-M for R-M > R-Zr and ESc-Zr approximate to ESc-M < EZr-Zr for R-M < R-Zr.
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments

Sentencas: Furthermore, relative experiments are carried out to verify the theoretical results.
Titulo: Influence of codoping on the conductivity of Sc-doped zirconia by first-principles calculations and experiments
